ma mulin ki paridima sha්rilanipayath ekabaddha wipakshayath dekama wena wenama idiripath kara aththe tharamak samana wu nirikshanayan wimada ek paththakin wadagath deyaki.

thamange deshapalana aadhipathya rauka ganimata palath sabha ka්ramayan bili dimata demala jathika sanwidhanaya pasubata nowuha. 2017 sapthambar masayedi anka 17 darana sanshodhana panathin palath palana chunda ka්ramaya sanshodhanaya kirimata aanduwa piyawaragath awasthawedi me aakarayata kadimudiye chanda ka්ramaya wenas karanne ee awasthawedi dina kihipayakin wisira yana palath sabhawalata chanda nopawathwa sitimata bawa mulu ratama danagena sitiyeya.

parlimenthuwa yanu wyawasthadayakayayi.enam prajathanthathrawadi rataka nithi sakasanne ethanayi.thawada ema nithi kriyathmaka kirimata widhayakaya nam aayathanayak da nithi kadu wita danduwam kirimata adhikaranaya nam aayathanayak da atha.parlimenthuwa magin nithi saka sime balaya hewath paramadhipathya aththe janathawa sathuwaya.namuth prayogikawa miliyana wissak pamana wana siyaluma janathawata parlimenthuwa thula raswi nithi sampadanaya kala nohaki bawin janathawa warin wara mathiwarana haraha thamange niyojithayanta ee sadaha balaya pawaranu labayi.ee niyojithayan parlimenuthuwa thula raswi wada wiwada kara janathawa wenuwen (janatha subhasiddhiya thaka) warin wara ana panath sammatha karanu labayi.
mama ara ammage tikat eka nudun nisa nawatha sihipath kalama kondora mahaththaya "salli dunne na ne" kiyala nawatha salli illanawa.
